metadata.description: An all-black-and-white one-shot in the spirit of the Mighty Marvel Magazines of yore, but All-Now in style!  Daredevil, the blind avenger of Hell's Kitchen faces a life changing decision when he is presented with the chance to see again. But at what cost will Matt regain his sight? Guest-starring Bullseye & the Kingpin!  And the Man Without Fear finds himself embroiled in a gang war in Japan.
metadata.name: Daredevil: Black and White
